long_description: Enjoy your backpacking meals to the max with the strong and lightweight Sea To Summit Delta plate. Food-grade nylon has a high melting point and is strong and rigid. Innovative hex pattern base reduces overall weight and helps keep the plate cool to the touch when eating hot foods. Thumb grip on side of plate keeps your fingers out of your food; grip doubles as a hanging loop. Steep side walls keep food and liquids from slopping over the edge.
short_description: Enjoy your backpacking meals to the max with the strong and lightweight Sea To Summit Delta plate.
